overview:
Co-founder, Investor and Chairman at Double Dare Studios (Tokii.com). Tokii is the world’s first relationship management platform, providing meaningful interaction through entertaining social gaming and unique trading experiences.

Al possesses a proven track record of strong leadership and ability to select, recruit and retain exceptional talent (both of expats and local nationals) for all operations. A strategic but practical thinker who combines the best aspects of an extensive experience with input from those working under him. He is flexible and understands the dynamics that require the blending of local knowledge and practices in emerging markets with proven management approaches that have been so successful in the West.

Al brings years of experience in guiding teams to develop aggressive but achievable annual, three and ten-year business plans and realistic, associated budgets.

Based on his experience and proven performance, he expects expect to be given significant operational latitude once the strategic aspects for the company are approved by the board and to be held accountable for the ensuing results. Al also recognizes the implicit values of team strength and champions loyalty within his teams.
